name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Displaying the names of donors who sent wristbands while the song 'Chu-Chu-Lu' plays.
Waiting screen showing the event logo and flower stand donor names.
Displaying donor names for lunch boxes and wristbands while the song 'Solaris' plays.

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To everyone who sent gifts, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 1 2 3次元
subtitles.english: 1 2 3-dimensional

subtitles.original: One Two Threeで飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Leap across with a One Two Three

subtitles.original: 今やめてもリアルで
subtitles.english: Even if I stop now, it's real

subtitles.original: ちくちくしないでラブとピースで
subtitles.english: Don't be prickly, with love and peace

subtitles.original: Chu-chaku wa wa wa
subtitles.english: Chu-chaku wa wa wa

subtitles.original: ときめいちゃう
subtitles.english: My heart's a-flutter

subtitles.original: トキメキあげ
subtitles.english: Giving you excitement

subtitles.original: ツンでタスン リビンワ
subtitles.english: Tsun de tasun ribin wa

subtitles.original: まてれば最強
subtitles.english: If you can wait, it's the strongest

subtitles.original: バーチャリアラ
subtitles.english: Virtual-ala

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment until the performance begins.

subtitles.original: Chu chu chu... chu chu chu...
subtitles.english: Chu chu chu... chu chu chu...

subtitles.original: Che cheri chu chu cho
subtitles.english: Che cheri chu chu cho

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 僕らが見ている太陽
subtitles.english: The sun that we are watching

subtitles.original: 八分音符のマエストロ
subtitles.english: The eighth note maestro

subtitles.original: 実はちょっと昔らしい
subtitles.english: Apparently it's from a while ago

subtitles.original: そう考えると不思議かもね
subtitles.english: When you think about it like that, it's strange

subtitles.original: そこにあるようでいて
subtitles.english: It seems to be right there

subtitles.original: 少し冷たい時間を過ごしてる
subtitles.english: Yet we spend our time a little cold

subtitles.original: きっと僕らの平行線
subtitles.english: Surely our parallel lines

subtitles.original: 隣の人のことを
subtitles.english: Know nothing about

subtitles.original: 一つも知らないけれど
subtitles.english: The person right next to us

subtitles.original: 分からないまま日が沈んでいった
subtitles.english: And the sun went down while we still didn't know

subtitles.original: アマテラテラスこの手で
subtitles.english: Amatera-terasu with this hand

subtitles.original: 触れて輪になって踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's touch and dance in a circle

subtitles.original: アマテラテラス聞かせて
subtitles.english: Amatera-terasu let me hear it

subtitles.original: あのね君だって歌えるよ
subtitles.english: You know, even you can sing

subtitles.original: 誰にだって降り注いだ
subtitles.english: Pouring down on everyone

subtitles.original: 八分音符の光が差す方へ
subtitles.english: Towards the direction where the eighth note light shines
